name: Somerset Villa

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled solo
reviews.text: I only spent 1 night here, but wish it could have been more. Cathy and Patrick are great hosts, I particularly enjoyed my chat with Pat over breakfast. My room (No.1) was spotless and very comfortable. Breakfast was also EXCELLENT. I'd strongly recommend this B&B to anyone visiting Bath.
reviews.title: Great hosts, great service and great breakfast!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: QueenFanAndrew
reviews.title: Patrick- the man, the myth, the legend!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for the weekend after Valentines, a combination romantic trip away with the added benefit of an away rugby match. Saw the reviews on here, and booked by phone. The place lived up to expectation and more- Patrick certainly did!! The accomodation is great- good sized room, nice big bed, and a small but well equipped en-suite with a great shower. The pump to assist the elderly plumbing gave us endless amusement everytime we ran the water.
reviews.title: Nice place to stay, with a really friendly and informative host!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Lovely touches in the room- a bowl of sweets, bottles of water and plentiful tea, coffee and toiletries.
reviews.title: Highly recommended

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The decor is a bit Antiques Roadshow, but fits the building and its location.
reviews.title: Look no further - this B&B is a winner!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: A great little B&B within a 20 minute walk from town... Buses pass by every 5 minutes. Patrick gave us a great big warm welcome. He quickly guided us to the proper desitnation as it was late in the evening and he knew that certain tours were closing. The room was great and the breakfast was very nice. Do not hesitate to book this B&B.
reviews.title: Welcome Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: had a lovely weekend away in bath. We didnt get there till 10pm and was welcomed by a very friendly patrick giving us lots of information on the local area. The room was lovely and clean and spacious. Very nic ebreakfasts and very comfy beds. will definitly be heading back there one day.:)
reviews.title: lovely,lovely,lovely

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Lovely big house with large rooms, beautifully decorated, squeaky clean. Energetic, enthusiastic hosts do anything and everything for your comfort, convenience and enjoyment. Excellent breakfasts. Walk to town in less than 15 minutes, bus back at night. Parking is tight, but they work it out for you. Excellent value, won't bother to look anywhere else when I return to Bath.
reviews.title: Terrific Bath B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Somerset Villa in May and I can't recommend it highly enough. The room was very large, very comfortable and had everything we needed.
reviews.title: Exceptional!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2010, traveled with family
reviews.text: Everything that has been written about Patrick is true (he is a wonderful host) - we didn't meet Cathy but I communicated with her via email and she was always prompt and helpful in her replies.
reviews.title: Wonderful Hosts and Great Value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011
reviews.text: From the moment we arrived we felt very much at home. Patrick gave us a very warm welcome and showed us into a delightful room at the front of the house. Very spacious, bright and clean with ample tea making facilities. Patrick showed to be very enthusiastic and knowledgeable about Bath and gave us lots of tips about where to eat etc. The walk in to Bath was a quick one, we don't walk that quick and we were in the centre in 20 mins. Breakfast was lovely and generous with fast flowing toast and tea on tap. We couldn't've asked for more.
reviews.title: Lovely B&B with a warm welcome and great food

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2010, traveled solo
reviews.text: For a single traveller staying for one night on a Saturday, it was next to impossible to find a room in a Bath B&B untill I contacted Cathy McGuire by e-mail. I was offered a very nice room at a very reasonable rate. Everyone knows that Bath B&Bs are not cheap specially on weekeneds.
reviews.title: I made the right choice !

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The loaction is just outside the center of the town on New Bridge Road. I had no difficulty in finding the place with my navigational system when I arrived from Oxford. It is about 20 minutes walk from the center square. There is also a bus which takes about five minutes if you do not want to walk.
reviews.title: Excellent hosts and value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It is on a quiet street with private off street parking. Though the driveway to the rear of the house for parking is very narrow !!
reviews.title: Friendly, helpful, good value

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The interior of the house is nicely decorated. The room it self was nicely decorated. It has a moderately spacious bathroom with brand name toiletories.
reviews.title: Wonderful, one of the best, a bit out of town

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nice place, app. 15-20 minutes walk from downtown Bath. Parking in the back. Nice breakfast. Host was very friendly and with lots of knowledge about Bath. No wifi (which is why I only give 4 points in service).
reviews.title: Nice, clean place.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A hint - we did not get to see the roman baths. There was a huge line of people waiting, and lots of tour groups. If you are there on a busy day (we visited easter saturday), go very early in the morning.
reviews.title: our number one choice upon return......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: from start to finish it was an absolute plesure, the owners were both very knowledgeable and encredibly helpfull and friendly......room was clean and fresh and breakfast was hot n fresh n tasty, as soon as we got there we were drawn up a map of where to go and what was around, nice location and just a walk through a beautifull park to the square, shops pub n restraunt on doorstep and a cashpoint too......looking forward to going back, very pleased :-) ciaran birmingham.
reviews.title: WONDERFUL

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011
reviews.text: from sheffield to bath, arrived and greeted by Cathy who was very helpful, giving directions into bath, room 3 was amazing the decor wow. Patrick/Cathy breakfast a delight.
reviews.title: Made our weekend! Fantastic!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Close to the Victoria Park, Royal cresent and The circus.
reviews.title: Fantastic

description: Cathy and Patrick McGuire welcome you to Somerset Villa, a Victorian house built in 1897 which still retains much of it's historic character such as original sash windows, working fireplaces, cornices, picture rails and other features of the Victorian age.
